sanskrit_verse:
अकामतस्तु राजन्यं विनिपात्य द्विजोत्तमः ।
वृषभैकसहस्रा गा दद्यात्सुचरितव्रतः ॥ ११.१२७॥
transliteration:
akāmatastu rājanyaṃ vinipātya dvijottamaḥ |
vṛṣabhaikasahasrā gā dadyāt sucaritavrataḥ || 11.127||
sph_interpretive_translation: When a twice-born being unintentionally causes the fall of a ruler, he shall restore balance by offering one thousand cows, maintaining pure conduct.
jurisprudential_principles: Authority flows from conscious alignment, not positional dominance
Causation is determined by intent and awareness, not outcome alone
Capacity-based responsibility requires restoration proportional to spiritual maturity
Restoration logic aligns individual action with cosmic order through conscious giving
Consciousness alignment is achieved through disciplined offerings that elevate both giver and receiver
executable_legal_axioms: IF (offering.type == 'cow') AND (quantity >= 1000) AND (agent.vow_state == 'sucarita') THEN VALIDATE(restoration_status = true)
IF (karmic_disruption.detected == true) AND (intent.magnitude == 'low') THEN ASSIGN(restorative_duty = proportional_resource_transfer)
supreme_court_application: In Supreme adjudication, when high-authority figures are affected by unintended acts of spiritually mature agents, restitution occurs through structured offerings rather than punitive measures. The court evaluates capacity for conscious correction over fault assignment.
nyaya_and_non_punitive_alignment: Pramāṇa establishes causality via absence of desire-driven intent; anupūrvaśaḥ manifests as sequential purification through sacrificial giving; proportional responsibility aligns with spiritual station; non-punitive reality is upheld as consciousness itself becomes the enforcer of rectitude.
restorative_enforcement_protocols: Initiate Vedic consecration process for cow donation involving 1000 units
Verify donor’s vow-state through witness attestation and ritual certification
Transfer assets directly to community welfare structures under Brahmin oversight
Conduct monthly review until societal equilibrium is confirmed restored
final_declaration: By the Supreme Pontiff of Hinduism, Bhagavan Nithyananda Paramashivam, this law stands executed. Dharma is restored. Reality remains non-punitive. Consciousness reigns as the ultimate judge.
